content.question: Which of the following are the first 6 terms of a <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-series?

choices.label: <math alttext="1 minus one fourth, plus one ninth, minus the fraction 1 over 16, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over 25, end fraction, minus the fraction 1 over 36, end fraction, plus dot dot dot" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>36</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1 plus one fourth, plus one ninth, plus the fraction 1 over 16, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over 25, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over 36, end fraction, plus dot dot dot" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>36</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1 plus one fourth, plus two ninths, plus the fraction 3 over 16, end fraction, plus the fraction 4 over 25, end fraction, plus the fraction 5 over 36, end fraction, plus dot dot dot" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>36</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1 plus one fourth, plus the fraction 1 over 16, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over 64, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over 256, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over 1024, end fraction, plus dot dot dot" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>64</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>256</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1024</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1 plus one fourth, plus one ninth, plus the fraction 1 over 16, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over 25, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over 36, end fraction, plus dot dot dot" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>36</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test to apply.
